help.commands: set ip,set port,set pending_limit,cls,exit,start,set font_size,auto_allow,set pin,pin_manager,stop,list,kick,save,load,clean_client,logger,filter_manager,mitm,sslcert_manager,set_mode,list_modes,dump_manager,regex_manager,help,IP Address,Port Number,Connection Limit,Size,State,PIN Code,Client ID,Save Name,Protocol,Mode,Module Name
help.cmd_set.ip: Set the IP Address of the proxy server to run on
help.cmd_set.port: Set the Port Number of the proxy server to run on
help.cmd_set.pending_limit: Set the number of connections allowed in pending state
help.cmd_set.font_size: Set the font size (in points) of the console screen
help.cmd_auto_allow: Set wheter to allow all connections, or accept them manually
help.cmd_set.pin: Set pin code to prompt on every command
help.cmd_pin_manager: Set wheter to use the PIN Code service
help.cmd_stop: Stop listening for new connections, close existing ones
help.cmd_kick: Kick a client from the server
help.cmd_save: Save the current settings of the program
help.cmd_clean_client: Disconnect all sockets from the server, but don't stop the server
help.cmd_logger: Set the state of the logger service
Enter the interactive mode of the logger
help.cmd_filter_manager: Set the state of the filter manager service

cmd_filter_manager.params: Enter the interactive mode of the Filter manager

help.cmd_filter_manager: Kick a client from the server
help.cmd_mitm: Set the state of the MITM Service
Enter the interactive mode of MITM manager
help.cmd_sslcert_manager: Set the state of the SSL Certification Manager Service
Enter the interactive mode of SSL Certification Manager
help.cmd_set.mode: Set the mode of the desired protocol
help.cmd_list_modes: Print the currently used modes for each protocols
help.cmd_dump_manager: Set the state of the Dump Manager Service
Enter the interactive mode of the Dump Manager
help.cmd_regex_manager: Set the state of the RegEx Manager Service
Enter the interactive mode of RegEx Manager
help.cmd_help: List help for main program commands
help.cmd_help.int: Start an interactive service based on the modulename
help.p_IP.Address: A valid IP Address for the proxy server

p_Port.Number.values: Number less than 65535,|,For most proxy servers it's 8080

help.p_Port.Number: A valid port number for the proxy server

p_Connection.Limit.values: Any integer (number) value,|,Mostly around 20/30 is good

help.p_Connection.Limit: Set a valid connection limit for the proxy server

p_Size.values: Any double (number with decimnal point) value,|,12.0 is not too big but also readable i think

help.p_Size: A valid font size for the console
help.p_State: A valid to bool convertable value for services
help.p_PIN.Code: A valid code for pin manager

p_Client.ID.values: An integer (number) value obtained by the list command

help.p_Client.ID: A valid client id to kick

p_Save.Name.values: Any valid name of a save you made,In case of save command: any name without file extension

help.p_Save.Name: A valid name for Settings Manager to save/load
help.p_Protocol: Specifies a valid protocol name for the server
help.p_Mode: Specifies a valid mode for a protocol

p_Module.Name.values: An valid module name listed by the help int command

help.p_Module.Name: Specifies a valid name of an interactive help to run
